sentences.cn: 一架飞机在头顶上轰鸣。

sentences.en: He can drone on for hours about his pet subjects.
sentences.cn: 他能就他的宠物侃侃而谈几小时.

sentences.en: He wouldn't drone when he may live by honest labour.
sentences.cn: 他可凭诚实的劳动生活时,他不愿游手好闲.

sentences.en: How many targets does that leave within the drone's range?
sentences.cn: 小飞机的航行范围内还有几个目标?

sentences.en: I hear the drone of an aeroplane as it banks across the bay.
sentences.cn: 飞机倾斜飞过海湾时，我听到它单调的低鸣。

sentences.en: Issues with the Stasis Drone Augmentor I & II modules have been resolved.
sentences.cn: 停滞无人机增强设备I 和 II装备问题都已解决.

sentences.en: It intervals the drone of an insect bored the air.
sentences.cn: 不时有只昆虫嗡嗡嗡地打破这阵寂静.

sentences.en: Occasionally could be heard the drone of unmolested'plane.
sentences.cn: 偶尔能听到飞机掠过的声音.

sentences.en: Stasis Drone Augmentors I & II have been seeded on the market.
sentences.cn: 停滞无人机增强设备I & II都已在市场中生成.

sentences.en: Terror drone's abilities are also well suited for mid - late game combat.
sentences.cn: 恐怖机器人的能力也非常适合 中后期 战斗.

sentences.en: The colony whines a centerless loud drone that vibrates the neighborhood.
sentences.cn: 蜂群嗡嗡喧闹的哀鸣振动邻里.
远处车辆往来发出的嗡嗡声

sentences.en: The minister's voice was a relentless drone.
The planes flew overhead with a low drone.
sentences.cn: 飞机发出低沉的轰鸣声掠过头顶.

sentences.en: The tonic pitch is played as a drone that runs throughout the performance.
sentences.cn: 主音音高作为一种低沉底音(低音调)奏出,在整个演奏中贯穿始终.

sentences.en: Will carriers ( Tempest ) produce more than one drone type?
sentences.cn: 风暴舰 ( 黑暗版航空母舰 ) 能生产一种以上的小飞机 么 ?

words.tran_cn: 声音低沉单调的；发嗡嗡声的
发嗡嗡声；单调低沉地说；闲散度日；单调无聊地进行（drone的ing形式）
雄蜂；嗡嗡的声音；懒惰者

trans.tran_cn: 雄蜂，嗡嗡声，持续低音，无人驾驶飞机
嗡嗡叫，嗡嗡响，絮絮叨叨地说
trans.tran_en: to make a continuous low dull sound
